Multiple news organizations: including Zee News, Navbharat Times, Patrika, and Punjab Kesari, have published the video, indicating its widespread circulation.
The video has gone viral on social media: such as Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube, with thousands of views and shares.
A close analysis of the video reveals in: such as the presence of a crowd and indications that it may be a scene from a shoot. Twitter users and commenters have also pointed out that the person in the video is an actor known for his roles in Gujarati movies and shows, suggesting that it may be a staged incident.
